alert.note: Alert for Durham; Orange; Person (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 7:13PM EDT until July 06 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Person County in central North Carolina... Northeastern Orange County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Durham County in central North Carolina... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 713 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Prospect Hill, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Roxboro, Rougemont, Bushy Fork, Lake Michie, Moriah, Surl and Bahama. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
